description.S1: Ludwig is one of the four people Silas sent you to collect from.
description.S2: He's stationed as a guard at the Landing Pad southeast of Edgewater.

blurb.B1: Ludwig Miller can be found at Edgewater Landing Pad,
blurb.B2: just outside Edgewater to the southeast.
blurb.B3: When you talk to him, you'll learn he fears an impending war against machines.
blurb.B4: Go along with it and offer to help.
blurb.B5: When you deal with the robot he will tell you there's a weapon in the Cantina's lavatory.
blurb.B6: After, mention Silas and he will pay up assuming Silas has heard the calling.
blurb.B7: You can lie (5) to get some extra loot out of him.
blurb.B8: Alternatively: You can kill him and collect his fees.

description.S1: You finished collecting gravesite fees from the people of Edgewater.

blurb.B1: After gathering all the gravesite fees,
blurb.B2: return to Silas to receive a reward of 300 bits.
blurb.B3: With a Persuade 6 check, Silas will agree to upping the reward by 150 bits.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: Thank the Law. I've been requisitioning backup for months. Guess the boss finally came to his senses.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: You ever swung a truncheon? Let me see your rifling stance. I wanna make sure you're up to snuff.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you okay? You seem confused.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Silas sent me. You owe him your gravesite fees.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: The war! The coming apocalypse. Man versus machine.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm talking about mechanicals, soldier. Cold, heartless automatons made of iron and lies.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Uh. Yeah. Gotta watch out for those mechanicals.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's right. That's what I been saying. We gotta square our shoulders and stand ever vigilant.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: Au. To. Mechanicals. Creatures forged in the fires of malevolence. I seen them over by the old power plant. Clattering about. Firing at the birds. Orchestrating their uprising.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: When the swarms of mechanicals come clanging on over that hill, where will you be? Cowering beneath your cot? Or standing shoulder to shoulder with the Resistance?

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: I told Silas I'd pay my dues if he agreed to join the Resistance. Guess this means he's finally heard the calling.
